verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing unto God, sing praises to His name.
Sing unto God, sing praises to His name.
Extol Him that rideth upon the heavens by His name.
Extol Him that rideth upon the heavens by His name.
Extol Him that rideth upon the heavens by His name.
By His name JAH (Yah)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Rejoice before Him,
And rejoice before Him.
And rejoice, rejoice before Him.
(Repeat.)
